abstract: By one measure, Warren E. Buffett is the most unpopular director on the board of Berkshire Hathaway. Of votes cast, 0.8 percent were against his reelection, more than those against any other director.
snippet: By one measure, Warren E. Buffett is the most unpopular director on the board of Berkshire Hathaway. Of votes cast, 0.8 percent were against his reelection, more than those against any other director.
lead_paragraph: By one measure, Warren E. Buffett is the most unpopular director on the board of the company he has built since 1965, Berkshire Hathaway.

headline.main: Buffett Gets Most ‘No’ Votes on Berkshire Board
